criteria: Explanation of Impact on Physical Activity
descriptions: Identifies one internal influence with limited accuracy.
Identifies two internal influences with some inaccuracies.
Identifies three internal influences with reasonable accuracy.
Identifies multiple internal influences comprehensively and accurately, demonstrating a strong understanding of their impact.
Identifies one external influence with limited accuracy.
Identifies two external influences with some inaccuracies.
Identifies three external influences with reasonable accuracy.
Identifies multiple external influences comprehensively and accurately, demonstrating a strong understanding of their impact.
No explanation of the impact of influences on physical activity.
Provides a superficial explanation of the impact of one influence.
Provides a basic explanation of the impact of two influences, but lacks depth.
Explains how several influences affect physical activity with some detail and accuracy.
Clearly explains how multiple internal and external influences affect physical activity with detail and accuracy.
Provides a comprehensive and insightful explanation of how multiple influences interact to affect physical activity, demonstrating a nuanced understanding.
